description.en: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. Today is even more auspicious, as it is associated with `revatI` star.

shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..
